answers.answer: If it's not your diabetes it could be athlete's foot. Maybe try buying an athlete's foot spray and see if you have any relief.

question: What can I do for itching feet at night after I fall asleep, it wakes me up and is driving me crazy.  I am 65 yrs of age and a diabetic but the dr does not seem to think it is caused from my diabetes because I have good circulation in my feet.  I do have some numbness on top of my feet but its the bottom itching that drives me insane, please can you help?
title: Itching feet
